Name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Ranseiki with Power Up Kit
About the game: To commemorate Kou Shibusawa's 35th anniversary, the 'Kou Shibusawa Archives' will be opened in the Steam Store. Here we will revive popular previously released titles. In this ninth round of releases, we offer 'NOBUNAGAâ€™S AMBITION: Ranseiki with Power Up Kit,' the enhanced version of the 9th release in the series. Ranseiki is a strategy based simulation game based in Japan's chaotic Warring States period. The series is revived with graphics that are reminiscent of the beauty of the Azuchi Momoyama period. In addition, not only have the battles evolved from turn based to real time, but we have included 7 non-Daimyou forces that played a large role in the times: Imperial Court, the temples and shrines, navy, independent cities, ninja groups, land owner class and the Bakufu. Players play as one of the powerful Daimyou and fight to unify the entire country.
